item.title: Being the Church: Living in community to reach the lost of Uganda
item.description:
Being the Church: Living in community to reach the lost of Uganda

KAABONG, Uganda - Susan Taliaferro picks up her screaming daughter, Ember, pleading with her to stop crying. The 2-year-old has been wailing, with barely a pause for breath, for the last two hours. Her 3-year-old brother sits at a small plastic table, throwing beans onto the floor as people rush in and out of the kitchen.
